readable.title: 3533145793_5d69f72e41
readable.content: A group of children do stretches on colored mats . A group of young girls are standing in a circle on brightly colored retangular sheets on the grassy ground with their hands in the air . A woman teaches yoga to kids at an outdoor festival . Children learn the art of yoga on colorful mats at a festival . Several young girls on colorful mats stretching upwards .
